## Main reference

* [Hadley Wickham guest lecture 2025](https://youtu.be/AiHR-kzfD7I?si=9uYTp17GSeM7MOAK)
* [Hadley's code from 2025](https://arp.numbat.space/week4/long-map.qmd)
* [Ch 5 Control Flow from *Advanced R*](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/control-flow.html). See Sec 5.3 on Loops.
* [Ch 9 Functionals from *Advanced R*](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/functionals.html), especially sections 9.2 and 9.3.
* [ellmer](https://ellmer.tidyverse.org/)

## What you will learn this week

* Using LLMs to assist with R programming
